segments.text: May I see your passport , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are here on business , I think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . A German company has invited me for business talks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will you be staying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many pieces of baggage have you got ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Only one . In this case , I have a camera .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you intend to take it out on your departure ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: According to the regulations , the camera you've brought along for personal use can be passed for the time being duty free , but you will have to take it out with you when you leave the country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . Have a pleasant stay in Germany .
segments.speaker: S1
